name: Planet 17
description:
You are a lone astronaut sent to explore Planet 17!

Flip your gravity to traverse the planet and retrieve fuel scattered around the environment.
Board your spaceship and set out on this adventure... Just be wary of what you may encounter"

This game was made by a small team of 3 people for the Game Maker’s Toolkit 48 hour Game Jam 2017.

• ART : Theihe (Dante Lundell)
• PROGRAMMING : Mieeh (David Styrbjörn)
• AUDIO : Corentin Brasart

Join us on Discord at: http://discordapp.com/invite/8s4thNx!
